verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and in the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H1419>great,<s%> sought <S%H1875>out<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that have <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> therein.
He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to be <S%H2143>remembered:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and full of <S%H7349>compassion.<s%>
He hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2964>meat<s%> unto them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him: he will <S%H5769>ever<s%> be <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
He hath <S%H5046>showed<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of his <S%H4639>works,<s%> that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> them the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen.<s%>
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H571>verity<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6490>commandments<s%> are <S%H539>sure.<s%>
They stand <S%H5564>fast<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and are <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H3477>uprightness.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people:<s%> he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> and <S%H3372>reverend<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> have <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H6213>do<s%> his commandments: his <S%H8416>praise<s%> <S%H5975>endureth<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
